page.title: 02Local Events in Kexby.
page.content: There is a{Youth Club}in the village which meets every Tuesday in the village hall.There is also a Womens Institute.There used to be a lot of dances held in the hall but these have declined in numbers in recent years. The local{Public Houses}have become the main meeting point of the village.They have darts and dominoe teams and both men and women can play. The{Chapel}in the village organises many activities for the children.An annual outing is also held and really the chapel is the one thing in the village that has not changed. Every year there is a{clay pigeon} shooting competition for the local farmers which is usually followed by a barbecue.However they have not had a barbecue for the last two years.
